articles.content: Snap Inc.s stock gained in volatile after-hours trading Thursday despite quarterly revenue that didnt meet Wall Street estimates.The company reported a first-quarter net loss of $359.6 million, or 22… [+3153 chars]

articles.author: Lauren Thomas
articles.title: Old Navy CEO to exit as parent company Gap cuts sales guidance - CNBC
articles.description: Gap Inc. announced Thursday that the CEO of its Old Navy division, Nancy Green, is leaving the business this week.
articles.content:
Gap Inc. announced Thursday that the CEO of its Old Navy division, Nancy Green, is leaving the business this week.

articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke, CNN Business
articles.title: Amazon to let other online retailers offer Prime delivery service directly on their sites - CNN
articles.description: Amazon announced Thursday that it will let third-party merchants offer Prime membership benefits such as free and fast shipping directly to Prime customers through their own online stores rather than solely through the e-commerce giant's platform.
